question.title: Is there an equivalent java/android lint to the clippy::disallowed_methods lint in rust?
question.body:
What I would like to do is warn on usage of View::findViewById as our project is using view bindings and those should be used instead.

I was expecting to just be able to add the method to a list of disallowed methods/functions similar to what is possible with clippy::disallowed_methods in rust.

Is there such a lint that I am just missing? Or a lint library that I can easily configure.

Notably I don't want an IDE plugin that every dev would need to configure themselves in their IDE nor would I like to have to write my own lint.
